fun: Would you rather always have to sing instead of speak or dance everywhere you walk?
Would you rather fight one horse-sized duck or a hundred duck-sized horses?
Would you rather have unlimited pizza or unlimited ice cream for life?
Would you rather be able to fly but only as fast as you walk, or run 100 mph but can't stop suddenly?
Would you rather always win at rock-paper-scissors or always guess the exact time without a clock?
Would you rather have a rewind button or a pause button in your life?
life: Would you rather know the date of your death or the cause of your death?
Would you rather be rich and alone or broke and surrounded by love?
Would you rather live in the past with your loved ones or in the future with new tech?
Would you rather always have good luck or always make good decisions?
Would you rather lose all your memories or never be able to make new ones?
Would you rather be famous but hated or unknown and loved?
school: Would you rather have no homework forever or never take a test again?
Would you rather always be 10 minutes late to class or 20 minutes early?
Would you rather have a teacher that’s super strict but you learn a lot, or super chill but you learn nothing?
Would you rather get an A on every test without studying or learn everything but still get B’s?
Would you rather have summer break all year but never graduate, or finish school tomorrow but start working right away?
Would you rather have lunch with your favorite teacher or a famous person for one hour?
relationships: Would you rather be in a relationship where you’re always laughing or always learning?
Would you rather date someone who’s super attractive but boring or average looking but incredibly interesting?
Would you rather fall in love once for a lifetime or have many great loves?
Would you rather your partner always knows what you're thinking or never understands your thoughts?
Would you rather be ghosted after the best date ever or have a super awkward date with someone who texts you forever?
Would you rather have a long-distance relationship with total trust or live close but always feel unsure?
technology: Would you rather lose your phone for a month or lose internet access for a week?
Would you rather have the newest tech forever or never have to charge your devices again?
Would you rather live in a world with no social media or no streaming platforms?
Would you rather be able to time travel once or download any skill instantly like in The Matrix?
Would you rather get hacked once a year or have slow internet forever?
Would you rather always get targeted ads that are eerily accurate or random ones that make no sense?
deep: Would you rather search for meaning your whole life or accept the mystery?
Would you rather be remembered by millions or cherished by a few?
Would you rather feel everything deeply or feel nothing at all?
Would you rather live a short, impactful life or a long, quiet one?
Would you rather know the truth and be sad or stay blissfully unaware?
Would you rather erase your biggest regret or guarantee future peace?
dark_humor: Would you rather haunt your ex or your high school principal?
Would you rather be stuck in a horror movie or a reality TV show forever?
Would you rather always hear spooky whispers at night or see shadows move from the corner of your eye?
Would you rather come back as a friendly ghost or a grumpy cat?
Would you rather get abducted by aliens or sit through a never-ending Zoom call?
Would you rather laugh at a funeral or cry at a wedding (and can't stop either way)?
